title: [Gameplay] Kindred getting a camp marked before 3:15

embed.description: Kindred can mark a camp before 3:15 if she gets a mark before then (i.e. if she kills a marked champion). This is not the only game this has happened to me on.

body: Kindred can mark a camp before 3:15 if she gets a mark before then (i.e. they kill a marked champion). It will mark the enemy gromp when this occurs and, as far as I know, always the enemy gromp. This is not the only game this has happened to me on. All you have to do to recreate this bug is mark and kill an enemy champion before 3:15{{champion:203}}
